1.question: How soon after waking up do you smoke your first cigarette?

2.question: Do you find it difficult to refrain from smoking in places where it is forbidden?

3.question: Which cigarette would you hate most to give up?

options.1: The first one in the morning

4.question: Do you smoke more in the morning than during the rest of the day?

5.question: Do you smoke when you are ill and bedridden all day?

6.question: On average, how many cigarettes do you smoke per day?

7.question: How many cigarettes are in a pack you usually buy?

8.question: What is the average price you pay for a pack of cigarettes?

9.question: How many years have you been smoking?

10.question: What is the main reason you want to quit smoking?

descriptions.low: You can quit smoking without much medication support. Please consider our basic packages.
descriptions.moderate: You may experience some difficulty quitting smoking. We recommend our standard support package.
descriptions.high: You need significant support to quit smoking. The premium support package would be suitable for you.
descriptions.very_high: You have a high level of nicotine dependence and need comprehensive support. We recommend our comprehensive support package combined with expert counseling.

milestones.title: The Beginning
milestones.description: Launched the initial version of our app focused on smoking cessation

milestones.title: Community Growth
milestones.description: Expanded user base to over 10,000 active members

milestones.title: Major Updates
milestones.description: Introduced AI-powered personalized recommendations and tracking

milestones.title: Global Impact
milestones.description: Expanded to multiple languages and reached users worldwide

features.title: Health-First Approach
features.description: Evidence-based methods and personalized plans for successful quitting

features.title: Community Support
features.description: Connect with others on the same journey and share experiences

features.title: Expert Guidance
features.description: Professional coaches and medical experts to support your journey

features.title: Goal Tracking
features.description: Set and track your goals with detailed progress analytics

privacy.1.title: Who is responsible for your information?
privacy.1.content.1: We are the entity responsible for managing and protecting the personal data you provide while using the smoking cessation support system.
privacy.2.title: What information do we collect?
privacy.2.content.3: - Smoking status, logs, and quit plans
privacy.2.content.4: - Feedback and messages within the system
privacy.2.content.6: - Usage behavior (login frequency, language, accessed features)
privacy.3.title: Purpose of information use
privacy.3.content.2: - Analyze, improve, and personalize the experience
privacy.4.title: Sharing of personal information
privacy.4.content.1: We do not share your personal information with third parties unless:
privacy.4.content.4: - Data is anonymized for academic research purposes
privacy.5.title: Data retention period
privacy.5.content.1: Your information will be stored until:
privacy.5.content.3:
- You request deletion of personal data
Some data may be retained as required by law.
privacy.6.title: Your rights
privacy.6.content.3: - Request updates, corrections, or deletion of your information
privacy.7.title: Data security
privacy.7.content.1: - Data is stored on a secure internal system.
privacy.7.content.2: - We use reasonable security measures to prevent unauthorized access, loss, or data breaches.
privacy.8.title: Cookies and behavior analytics
privacy.8.content.1: The system may use cookies to:
privacy.8.content.3:
- Analyze user behavior to improve the experience
You can disable cookies via browser settings, but some features may not function properly.
privacy.9.title: For users under 18
privacy.9.content.1: The system is not intended for users under 18. If unauthorized use is detected, we may suspend the account and delete related data.
privacy.10.title: Policy changes
privacy.10.content.1: This policy may be adjusted to reflect legal or technical changes. Major changes will be announced directly within the system.
